app:create.description:
Create a shiny new mobile application
...
Create a new mobile app from a template using all sorts of nifty options!

Tool will create an app using values from parameters or from the user config file which is located here:  ~/.config/@geek/mobile/config.json
Future versions of the tool will allow setting config values from CLI.
app:create.examples:
[4mCreate app from template in npm package[24m

[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name [@scope/]<name>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name [@scope/]<name>@<tag>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name [@scope/]<name>@<version>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name [@scope/]<name>@<version range>

[4mCreate app from template in git repo[24m

[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <git-host>:<git-user>/<repo-name>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <git-host>:<git-user>/<repo-name>#<tag>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <git-host>:<git-user>/<repo-name>#<branch>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <git repo url>

[3m(where <git-host> can be: github, bitbucket, or gitlab)[23m

[4mCreate app from template in tarball[24m

[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <tarball file>
[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <tarball url>

[4mCreate app from template in local directory[24m

[33m[1mmobile app:create[22m[39m my-app-name <folder>

template.name: template
template.description: [default: @titanium/template-alloy-default] Template to use for creating your new app

id.name: id
id.description: [default: Generate from project name] ID for your project

path.name: path
path.description: Specifies the directory where you want to initialize the project

license.name: license
license.description: Specifies the license for the project

github_username.name: github_username
github_username.description: Specifies the github username for the project

author_name.name: author_name
author_name.description: Specifies the full name of the Author

author_email.name: author_email
author_email.description: Specifies the email address of the Author

author_url.name: author_url
author_url.description: Specifies the URL for the Author

args.name: template
args.description: Template to use for creating your new app
